blocks.content: The Grafana Cloud Linux server integration comes with a number of pre-built dashboards and alerts that you can use immediately. In this step of the journey, you install those dashboards and alerts.
In the **Install dashboards and alerts** section, click **Install**.
You should see the following message: `Dashboards and alerts have been installed.`
Click **View Dashboards** to see the integration dashboards.
A folder containing the integration dashboards appears.
Navigate to **Alerts & IRM > Alerting > Alert rules** to see the installed alerts.
The Alert rules page shows all active alerts. Linux integration alerts begin with `integrations-linux-node`.
